Headline: Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute near Lawndale/27th
ShortDescription: Northbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Central Park, 26th, and Lawndale due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Central Park, 26th, and Lawndale due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at California
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at California due to a sick customer.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at California due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
